paper_abstract: This note points out some technical problems in the proofs of some lemmas in the above-mentioned paper, and presents their corresponding corrections. Nevertheless, the main results of that paper are still true. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Comments on "Finite iterative algorithms for the reflexive and anti-reflexive solutions of the matrix equation A(1)X(1)B(1) + A(2)X(2)B(2) = C"
